name: Humans: It's What's For Dinner (RadicalCowStudios)
description:
This is a game developed by a group of students from the University of Utah.

Warning: The game is not 100% bug free. The game also uses some crude language in its dialogue, viewer discretion is advised!

The herder becomes the herded!

Take on the role of an anthropomorphic bovine, freshly employed by the Supreme Cow itself to herd those inferior humans to their meat-processed destiny!

Features include:

  • Buying upgrades to make your job easier!
  • Timed levels! Push your herding skills to the max!
  • Two, count them, two separate endings!

Controls:

Mouse - Movement

Space Bar or Left Click - Push

Escape - Quit Application
